subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Eight Belles (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: From the 134th Derby to the running of No. 135, the shock of Eight Belles’s collapse and death by injection last year gave way to Mine That Bird’s romp of awe.
snippet: From the 134th Derby to the running of No. 135, the shock of Eight Belles’s collapse and death by injection last year gave way to Mine That Bird’s romp of awe.
